title: Series 2 Roles

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Timeshift a player each night. At the start of the next day, they will be given a new rolecard, which is a slightly modified version of their original role, as detetermined by the host. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will be informed of your targets' timeshifted roles.

desc:
